mistral:7b-instruct: The EPO plan from Reserve Bank Health Society fits your profile due to its comprehensive coverage for hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and maternity care, which aligns with your multiple health conditions including hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, and stroke. Moreover, the affordable monthly premium of $320 makes it a suitable option considering your upper-middle income bracket, while the maximum out-of-pocket expense of $5000 helps manage potential medical costs effectively given your high risk profile.
